languages.text: Таинства преподобного Терсития даровали экипажу откровение, как нести неумолимую смерть вражеским кораблям и выискивать их слабые места, не поддаваясь горячке боя.
The sacraments of Confessor Tercitius have blessed the crew with a vision of how they might rain unrelenting death down upon enemy vessels and seek out their vulnerabilities in the heat of battle.
languages.original_text: Таинства преподобного Терсития даровали экипажу откровение, как нести неумолимую смерть вражеским кораблям и выискивать их слабые места, не поддаваясь горячке боя.

traits.locale_text: The sacraments of Reverend Tercitius have blessed the crew with a vision of how they might rain unrelenting death down upon enemy vessels and seek out their vulnerabilities in the heat of battle.
The sacraments of Reverend Tercitius blessed the crew a revelation of how to rain unrelenting death upon enemy vessels.

The sacraments of Confessor Tercitius have blessed the crew with a vision of how they might rain unrelenting death down upon enemy vessels and seek out their vulnerabilities in the heat of battle.

languages.text: Die Sakramente von Konfessor Tercitius haben die Crew mit einer Vision gesegnet, wie sie feindlichen Schiffen den Tod bringen und ihre Verwundbarkeiten in der Hitze der Schlacht suchen kann.
languages.original_text: The sacraments of Confessor Tercitius have blessed the crew with a vision of how they might rain unrelenting death down upon enemy vessels and seek out their vulnerabilities in the heat of battle.

traits.locale_text: Die Sakramente von Konfessor Tercitius haben die Crew mit einer Vision gesegnet, wie sie feindlichen Schiffen den Tod bringen und ihre Verwundbarkeiten in der Hitze der Schlacht suchen kann.

languages.text: Los sacramentos del confesor Tercitius han bendecido a la tripulación con una visión sobre cómo desatar un incesante bombardeo letal sobre las naves enemigas e identificar sus puntos débiles en el fragor de la batalla.
languages.original_text: The sacraments of Confessor Tercitius have blessed the crew with a vision of how they might rain unrelenting death down upon enemy vessels and seek out their vulnerabilities in the heat of battle.

traits.locale_text: Los sacramentos del confesor Tercitius han bendecido a la tripulación con una visión sobre cómo desatar un incesante bombardeo letal sobre las naves enemigas e identificar sus puntos débiles en el fragor de la batalla.

languages.text: テルキティウス聴罪師の聖餐は、敵の船に無慈悲な死の雨を降らせ、戦闘のさなかに敵艦の弱点を探し出す方法をビジョンで見せてクルーを祝福した。
languages.original_text: The sacraments of Confessor Tercitius have blessed the crew with a vision of how they might rain unrelenting death down upon enemy vessels and seek out their vulnerabilities in the heat of battle.

traits.locale_text: テルキティウス聴罪師の聖餐は、敵の船に無慈悲な死の雨を降らせ、戦闘のさなかに敵艦の弱点を探し出す方法をビジョンで見せてクルーを祝福した。

languages.text: 告解神父特希提乌斯的圣礼让船员看到了神圣的启示，让他们明白了如何找到敌舰的弱点，在敌人头上降下无情的死亡之雨。
languages.original_text: The sacraments of Confessor Tercitius have blessed the crew with a vision of how they might rain unrelenting death down upon enemy vessels and seek out their vulnerabilities in the heat of battle.

traits.locale_text: 告解神父特希提乌斯的圣礼让船员看到了神圣的启示，让他们明白了如何找到敌舰的弱点，在敌人头上降下无情的死亡之雨。

languages.text: Les sacrements du confesseur Tercitius ont conféré aux membres de l'équipage une vision de la manière dont ils peuvent faire pleuvoir la mort sur les bâtiments ennemis et détecter leurs vulnérabilités dans le feu des combats.
languages.original_text: The sacraments of Confessor Tercitius have blessed the crew with a vision of how they might rain unrelenting death down upon enemy vessels and seek out their vulnerabilities in the heat of battle.

traits.locale_text: Les sacrements du confesseur Tercitius ont conféré aux membres de l'équipage une vision de la manière dont ils peuvent faire pleuvoir la mort sur les bâtiments ennemis et détecter leurs vulnérabilités dans le feu des combats.

languages.text: Günah Çıkarıcı Tercitius'un dinî törenleri, mürettebatın zihnini düşman gemilerine acımasızca nasıl ölüm yağdırılabileceğine ve muharebe sürerken zayıflıklarından nasıl faydalanılabileceğine dair imgelerle doldurdu.
languages.original_text: The sacraments of Confessor Tercitius have blessed the crew with a vision of how they might rain unrelenting death down upon enemy vessels and seek out their vulnerabilities in the heat of battle.
